Traditional fundraising often feels disconnected—limited to one-time events, manual coordination, or generic donation links.

x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  1. Volunteer registration and profile management

  2. Event scheduling and real-time ride tracking

  3. Fundraising and donation integration with trusted platforms

  4. Leaderboards to boost engagement and friendly competition

  5. Community wall for updates, inspiration, and impact stories

  6. Wellness badges for consistency and milestones

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  1. ServiceNow Platform: to manage events, user registration, and donations

  2. Mobile App Framework / Now Experience UI for an engaging user interface

  3. Integration APIs for payment gateways and fitness trackers

  4. Gamification & AI insights to motivate users and measure social impact

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  1. Data Integration & Tracking Accuracy – Ensuring reliable sync with multiple fitness trackers (e.g., Strava, Fitbit, Apple Health) and converting physical activity data into validated donation metrics.

  2. Donation Transparency & Compliance – Managing secure payments, transparent donation tracking, and ensuring compliance with nonprofit and fundraising regulations.

  3. User Engagement Over Time – Sustaining motivation after initial excitement fades; building in gamification, team challenges, and seasonal events will help retain participation.
